appDescription: A modular web application for software measurement and estimation, utilizing FPA and GQM methodologies, with a focus on meeting the expected results of the measurement process up to MR-MPS.BR Level F
demoDescription: Click above to explore the application with demo data
techStack: Built with Next.js, React, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS
heroSubtitle: Estimate, measure, and track software projects with ease and efficiency
heroDescription: A platform for IT companies that simplifies and enhances software estimation (FPA) and measurement planning (GQM), optimizing the collection and analysis of metrics throughout the entire project measurement process.
featuresDescription: Essential methodologies and tools for more assertive decisions, clear understanding, and effective control.

fpaEstimation.title: Function Point Analysis
fpaEstimation.description: Implementation of the standard IFPUG FPA methodology for accurate software size estimation and effective project planning in IT companies.

measurementPlans.title: GQM Measurement Plans
measurementPlans.description: Applies the Goal-Question-Metric (GQM) methodology to develop comprehensive measurement plans and enhance the analysis of software metrics in IT companies.

projectTracking.title: Results Visualization
projectTracking.description: Clear and intuitive dashboard visualization of estimation and measurement results, with export option

organizationManagement.title: Software Measurement Monitoring
organizationManagement.description: Features for the continuous tracking and evaluation of software metrics. Visualize progress, identify trends, and support data-driven decision-making.

automation.title: Calculation Automation
automation.description: Automated calculation processes to demonstrate computational approaches to software metrics and estimation accuracy.

collaboration.title: Academic Collaboration
collaboration.description: Collaborative features designed for educational environments, enabling group work and peer learning in software engineering.

benefitsDescription: Supporting IT companies in estimating, measuring, and optimizing software projects through clear data and proven methodologies.

accurateEstimation.title: Precise Estimates
accurateEstimation.description: Gain more reliable project estimates using the industry-standard FPA methodology.

timeEfficiency.title: Operational Efficiency
timeEfficiency.description: Automate complex calculations and measurement planning, freeing your team to focus on strategic, higher-value tasks.

dataInsights.title: Data-Driven Decisions
dataInsights.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights with comprehensive visualizations and measurement analyses, driving strategic decisions.

teamCollaboration.title: Enhanced Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Foster collaboration among teams with shared measurement plans and standardized estimates, improving project communication and cohesion.

ctaDescription: Explore a platform that simplifies software measurement, offering the necessary tools and insights for effective project control.
footerDescription: Platform for IT companies in software estimation and measurement. Developed as part of a final graduation project for educational purposes.
